law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393,sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982; and ch. 447, sec. 1, effective April 12, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. I, sec. 4. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. I, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4618-69.

metadata.lrc-note: This section was amended by two 1982 Acts which do not appear to be in conflict and have been compiled together.
